thread.title: Liverpool v Adelaide: Video, highlights, live updates of match at Adelaide Oval |
thread.title_full: Liverpool v Adelaide: Video, highlights, live updates of match at Adelaide Oval | The Advertiser

title: Liverpool v Adelaide: Video, highlights, live updates of match at Adelaide Oval |
text:
PREMIER League giants Liverpool defeated Adelaide United 2-0 in the second game of their two-game Australian tour at Adelaide Oval on Monday night.
James Milner was awarded a goal on 67 minutes but was in an offside position when the cross came in from the excellent Jordan Ibe. New signing Danny Ings wrapped it up with three minutes left when he took a neat through ball from Nathaniel Clyne and scored his first Liverpool goal.
Milner scores offside goal 0:42 Play video
Football: Liverpool took the lead over Adelaide United in the 67th minute through a James Milner goal but he looked to be offside.
Fox Sports 20 Jul 2015 Sport/Football/News The game started with another epic rendition of You’ll Never Walk Alone from a sold out, pro-Liverpool crowd. Adelaide's epic YNWA 1:47 Play video
Football: The Liverpool fans were in full voice at the Adelaide Oval with a stirring rendition of 'You'll Never Walk Alone'
Fox Sports 20 Jul 2015 Sport/Football/News The visiting English side opened the short tour with a 2-1 win over Brisbane in front of nearly 50,000 fans at Suncorp Stadium, with Adam Lallana and new recruit Milner’s second-half strike completing Liverpool’s come-from-behind victory.
See how the game unfolded in our live blog below!
Live: Liverpool v Adelaide (Frame content direct link: http://embed.scribblelive.com/Embed/v7.aspx?Id=1391613&ThemeId=16707 .)
Originally published as Liverpool turn on style against Adelaide
